mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME as userName, PW as pw, ROLE, CREATED_DT as createdDt, UPDATED_DT as updatedDt FROM USERS WHERE USERNAME = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (ID, USERNAME, PW, ROLE, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_DT) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{pw}, #{role}, #{createdDt}, #{updatedDt})
